trans-unit.source: Provides information that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> uses for mapping between an XML namespace, a CLR namespace, and the assembly that contains the relevant types for that CLR namespace.
This type is specific to the WPF implementation of XAML.
trans-unit.target: Questo tipo è specifico dell'implementazione di WPF di XAML.

trans-unit.source: If you use it in a general XAML implementation, you must include the WPF assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Se si utilizza in un'implementazione XAML generale, è necessario includere assembly WPF.

trans-unit.source: Alternative techniques that do not require including WPF assemblies include referencing the XAML schema context (available in a service provider context from <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider>, or from <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter.SchemaContext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> from a XAML node loop or general XAML writer frame of reference.) The XAML schema context includes API for returning its assemblies, preferred prefix mappings, and XAML namespace information.
trans-unit.target: Tecniche alternative che non richiedono l'inclusione di assembly WPF comprendono riferimenti contesto dello schema XAML (disponibile in un contesto del provider di servizi da <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider>, o da <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter.SchemaContext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> da un ciclo del nodo XAML o il frame del writer XAML generale di riferimento.) Contesto dello schema XAML include API per la restituzione relativo assembly, mapping del prefisso preferito e le informazioni dello spazio dei nomi XAML.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.NamespaceMapEntry" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.NamespaceMapEntry" /> class.
The mapping prefix for the XML namespace.
The assembly that contains the CLR namespace and types to map to the XML namespace.
The CLR namespace in the assembly that contains the relevant types.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.NamespaceMapEntry" /> class, using provided XML namespace, CLR namespace, and assembly information.
Use the "simple name" form for `assemblyName`.
In particular, do not specify pathing, and do not include the file extension.
trans-unit.target: In particolare, non specificare percorso e non includere l'estensione di file.

trans-unit.source: This is analogous to the form that might be reported by <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Questo comportamento è analogo al form che potrebbero essere restituiti da <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Paths are specified separately; see <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.SetAssemblyPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: I percorsi sono specificati separatamente. vedere <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.SetAssemblyPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="xmlNamespace" /> is <see langword="null" />
-or-
<paramref name="assemblyName" /> is <see langword="null" />
-or-
<paramref name="clrNamespace" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Gets or sets the assembly name that contains the types in the CLR namespace.
The assembly name.
Use the "simple name" form for <xref:System.Windows.Markup.NamespaceMapEntry.AssemblyName%2A>.
In particular, do not specify the full path, and do not include the file extension.
trans-unit.target: In particolare, non si specifica il percorso completo e non includere l'estensione di file.

trans-unit.source: This is analogous to the form that might be reported by <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Questo comportamento è analogo al form che potrebbero essere restituiti da <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The value <see cref="P:System.Windows.Markup.NamespaceMapEntry.AssemblyName" /> is being set to is <see langword="null" />.
Gets or sets the CLR namespace that contains the types being mapped.
The CLR namespace.
The value <see cref="P:System.Windows.Markup.NamespaceMapEntry.ClrNamespace" /> is being set to is <see langword="null" />.
Gets or sets the mapping prefix for the XML namespace being mapped to.
The mapping prefix for the XML namespace.
trans-unit.target: Il prefisso di mapping dello spazio dei nomi XML.

trans-unit.source: The value <see cref="P:System.Windows.Markup.NamespaceMapEntry.XmlNamespace" /> is being set to is <see langword="null" />.
